title: Bug 6410: File appears dirtied by code assist even when unchanged
description: When using code assist in a Java file, the file appears to be dirtied even if no changes are made. The code assist feature does not appear as expected.
OB: When using code assist by pressing CtrlSpace, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made. Additionally, the code assist feature does not appear.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open a Java file. 2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below:  Object o = anotherObject.method(I); 3. Press CtrlSpace to use code assist.
